${ModID}:Vindicate.NAME: Vindicate
${ModID}:Vindicate.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 每当 you play an Attack this turn, 获得 !M! 格挡 。

${ModID}:DarkLance.NAME: Dark Lance
${ModID}:DarkLance.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL If you've changed Stances this turn, 抽 !M! 张牌。

${ModID}:Slam.NAME: Slam
${ModID}:Slam.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL 获得 Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

${ModID}:Decapitate.NAME: Decapitate
${ModID}:Decapitate.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Enemy loses !M! 点 力量 this turn. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Titans力量.NAME: Titan's 力量
${ModID}:Titans力量.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 获得 !M! 点 力量.

${ModID}:Epiphany.NAME: Epiphany
${ModID}:Epiphany.DESCRIPTION: If you are in a Stance, exit it and 抽 !M! 张牌。 NL Otherwise, enter ${ModID}:Aggression.

${ModID}:InnerFury.NAME: Inner Fury
${ModID}:InnerFury.DESCRIPTION: 每当 you enter or exit ${ModID}:Aggression, 获得 !M! temporary 力量 and !M! 格挡 。 NL Enter ${ModID}:Aggression.

${ModID}:LunaticRage.NAME: Lunatic Rage
${ModID}:LunaticRage.DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张牌。 NL 获得 [E] [E] . NL Discard all non-Attack non-Status cards. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Animosity.NAME: Animosity
${ModID}:Animosity.DESCRIPTION: When you enter, exit, or start your turn in ${ModID}:Aggression, 获得 !M! 点 力量.
